00010 QperpGenerator::QperpGenerator( unsigned long n, bool correlated_ )
00011   : _dim( n ), qps( n, correlated_ ), _weights( n ), _isZeroed( n+1 )
00012 {
00013   YukawaFunction yuk( _dim );
00014   UniformFunction uni( _dim );
00015   
00016   qDistFn = yuk;
00017   yukDistFn = yuk;
00018   thDistFn = uni; 
00019   uniDistFn = uni;
00020 
00021   _correlated = correlated_;
00022 
00023   // k is never zeroed
00024   _isZeroed[n] = false;
00025 }

00032 void QperpGenerator::SetZeroedQs( unsigned long num )
00033 {
00034   _zeroSet = num;
00035 
00036   if ( _correlated )
00037   {
00038     _NumberToBoolArray( num, _isZeroed, _dim );
00039 
00040     _numZeroedQs = 0; _evenZeroes = true;
00041     for (unsigned long i=0; i<_dim; ++i) 
00042     {
00043       if (_isZeroed[i])
00044       {   ++_numZeroedQs; _evenZeroes = !_evenZeroes; }
00045     }
00046   }
00047   else
00048   {
00049     for (unsigned long i=0; i<num; ++i)
00050       _isZeroed[i] = 1;
00051     for (unsigned long i=num; i<_dim; ++i)
00052       _isZeroed[i] = 0;
00053 
00054     _numZeroedQs = num;
00055     _evenZeroes = !(num % 2);
00056   }
00057 }
00058 
00059 void QperpGenerator::FindRandomQs( MyArray& inForQs, MyArray& qmins, MyArray& qmaxs, 
00060                            MyArray& inForThs, MyArray& thmins, MyArray& thmaxs, 
00061                            MyArray& mu2s )
00062 {
00063   // We have inputs: inForQs, inForThs - randomly distributed numbers between 0,1
00064   // We want to produce Qs, Ths distributed between qmins,qmaxs and thmins,thmaxs
00065   MyArray _qs( _dim ), _ths( _dim );
00066   SetZeroedQs( 0 );
00067 
00068   qDistFn->SetLimits( qmins, qmaxs );
00069   yukDistFn->SetLimits( qmins, qmaxs );
00070   thDistFn->SetLimits( thmins, thmaxs );
00071   uniDistFn->SetLimits( thmins, thmaxs );
00072 
00073   qDistFn->SetParams( mu2s ); 
00074   yukDistFn->SetParams( mu2s );
00075 
00076   qDistFn->NormedIntegralInverse( inForQs, _qs );
00077   thDistFn->NormedIntegralInverse( inForThs, _ths );
00078 
00079   qps.SetQperps( _qs, _ths );
00080 
00081   MyArray tmp1( _dim ), tmp2( _dim ), tmp3( _dim ), tmp4( _dim );
00082   qDistFn->function( _qs, tmp1 );
00083   yukDistFn->function( _qs, tmp2 );
00084   thDistFn->function( _ths, tmp3 );
00085   uniDistFn->function( _ths, tmp4 );
00086 
00087   _totWeight = 1.;
00088   for (unsigned long i=0; i<_dim; ++i)
00089   {
00090     _weights[i] = tmp2[i]/tmp1[i] * tmp4[i]/tmp3[i];
00091     _totWeight *= _weights[i];
00092   }
00093 }
00094 
00095 double QperpGenerator::GetQeventWeight() const
00096 {
00097   double tmp = 1.;
00098 
00099   for (unsigned long i=0; i<_dim; i++)
00100   {
00101     if ( !_isZeroed[i] )
00102       tmp *= _weights[i];
00103   }
00104   if ( !_evenZeroes ) tmp = -tmp;
00105   return tmp;
00106 }
